data.text:
This data the coastal Pottsville ocean water temperature today, tomorrow and the upcoming days. Besides, you can also get information about the weather and surf forecast, as well as the data on sunrise / sunset and moonrise / moonset at a given point on any given day.

Current ocean temperature in Pottsville

Water temperature in Pottsville today is 20.4°C. Based on our historical data over a period of ten years, the warmest water in this day in Pottsville was recorded in 2017 and was 21.2°C, and the coldest was recorded in 2019 at 19.5°C. Sea water temperature in Pottsville is expected to rise to 20.5°C in the next 10 days. August average water temperature in Pottsville is 20.3°C, the minimum temperature is 18.5°C, and the maximum is 21.9°C.

The swimming season in Pottsville lasts from January to December, twelve months per year! During those months, Pottsville water temperature does not drop below 20°C and therefore suitable for comfortable swimming. The average water temperature in Pottsville in winter reaches 21°C, in spring 21.8°C, in summer the average temperature rises to 25.6°C, and in autumn it is 24.8°C.

Pottsville water temperature now

The ocean salinity in Pottsville is 35.57‰, and the average salinity of the World Ocean is 35‰.
